wikipedia_page.main: Paul Wilson McKay (born 28 January 1971) is an English former professional footballer who played as a full back. He played twelve matches in the Football League for Burnley, before moving into non-league football with Slough Town in 1993. He made his Burnley debut on 18 December 1989, replacing Roger Eli in the 5–0 victory over Scunthorpe United in the FA Cup.
